name: Godot WWII Fps Game Very Early Prototype
name_original: Godot WWII Fps Game Very Early Prototype
description:
This is a WWII game made with Godot. Its in very early developpement, a prototype so that people can give me feedback on the way things feel so I can make the game as enjoyable and as good as I can. The game will be low poly, for it to run on most computers and mobile. The game will be published on itch.io, Steam and Google Play. Donations are appreciated, anyone who donates before beta release will get free access to the full game as it helps finance the project. Also, don't hesitate to give me feedback, ask questions, requests or give me tips to make the game better. That is the reason this prototype has been released! Thanks!

W:Forward

S:Backward

A:Left

D:Right

1:Switch to shotgun

2:Switch to submachine gun

E:Pick up ammo 

R:Reload

****PLAY IN FULL SCREEN****
